title: HR On-Demand (Basic Package)
imageAlt: A top-down view of a desk with books, glasses, coffee and person's hands taking notes
description: Perfect for the small businesses or departments who have under 10 staff. This package will give you the ability to meet & call a dedicated HR Consultant at any time and get specific advice on any HR-related matter. Use this subscription for ad-hoc HR advice or monthly HR check-in meetings to keep your people plan on track. This package includes review & updates on HR policies, employment rules and regulations.
